ygData.subject: mixing bowls
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I love this list!! I just have one question... I have a 120 currently in pottery and have tried to make mixing bowls. I made them with no problems, but
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I love this list!! I just have one question...
I have a 120 currently in pottery and have tried to make mixing bowls. I
made them with no problems, but having 7 backpacks on me for materials, when
i successfully fired the bowl, it droped to the ground because a container
can't be stored in another container..... now, how in the world are you
doing this efficiently? As it is, I have a better/faster time making pie
tins..... any help would be greatly appreciated!!
